Top Projects On $SUI By TVL

Over the past 30 days, the total value locked (TVL) on Sui rose by 38%, led by an explosive 117.97% surge from Sudo Finance.

While DeepBook, DoubleUp, Bridgers, and Suilend Protocol all saw strong double-digit gains.

#CoinPedia #CryptoNews

Top 6 TVL Leaders on #Base

 #Circle commands the top spot with $3.8B TVL, but DeFi challengers like Aerodrome ($838.9M), Morpho ($705.2M), and Aave ($614.3M) are closing the gap.

All eyes are on #AAVE, can it smash through the $1B milestone?

#CoinPedia #CryptoNews

#Bitcoin’s Future According to ARK Invest

Bear case: $500K 

Base case: $1.2M 

Bull case: $2.4M 

No matter the path, $BTC's next chapter looks BIG! Are you ready for 2030?

Brazil makes history by launching the world's first spot $XRP ETF.

"#XRPH11, issued by #Hashdex and managed by Genial Investimentos, debuted on April 25, marking its first day of trading on Brazil’s B3 stock exchange.

More details

https://coinpedia.org/news/xrp-etf-news-brazil-launches-worlds-first-spot-xrp-etf-xrph11/…

2015: 1kg gold = 137 $BTC.
Now: 1kg gold = 1.16 $BTC.

10 years ago, gold ruled. Today, #Bitcoin rewrites the rules.

Top #MemeCoins of the Week

 $NEIRO leads with an extraordinary 306.60% growth, now valued at $74.74M.

 $MYRO follows closely with a 174.7% increase, reaching a market cap of $30.67M, while #ZEREBRO gains 165.8%, reaching $52.57M.
